Title: EmailMasterTemplate
Description: This user master and child user control based email template engine.
HomeWiki:
Project Description: This is email template utility project. In my scenario, I have lots of different type of email is going outside. However all email has same template.
To separate the template part, I have created Email-Master than rest of the email have only content part.

Before coming to this solution, I have used html email template & xslt.

Some more details is available in my blog.

http://anjumrizwi.blogspot.com/2010/11/3-ways-to-send-emails-with-dynamic.html
